title: Torture when you leave a game
body: Ok. So. I. Was. Playing. Pvp. A Troll tahm kench was in our team and he kept spitting me onto towers. I rage quitted. This happens a lot in my games and I rage quit. So what I think riot should do about leaverbuster is make it if you don't leave for let's say 3 months then it restarts back to 0 games left and 5 min wait. So yeah. This is probably noob posting but srsly, Riot should make the torture less painful.

replies.body: All i want is a way to tell if i have a buster because half the time i receive one without evening being notified about it so im not even sure if i received one for leaving or not and then i go into a party all ready to have game with no knowledge of my buster and piss off about 1-4 people occasionally even 5 (myself included). I just want to have say a little notification thingy (preferably similar to that of champion disables) to let me know if i have one or not.

Hey there,

The leaverbuster system does actually have a mechanism built in for tracking and reducing (or increasing) the potential punishment you will receive when leaving a game.

This is known as your "Leaver Level", over time your leaver level will degrade (As long as you play games to completion and do not leave), however when you leave a game your leaver level will increase.

Your leaver level is a hidden value and there is currently no way for you to look this up.
